title: Article 2 - Attendance for Managerial/confidential Employees in New York State Departments and Institutions
content:
Article 2 - Attendance for Managerial/confidential Employees in New York State Departments and Institutions

State Regulations

Part 27 - General Attendance Provisions (§ 27.1 to 27.3)

Part 28 - Absence with Pay (Subpart 28-1 to 28-3)

Part 29 - Leaves Without Pay (§ 29.1 to 29.2)

Part 30 - Drawing Of Earned Credits Upon Separation Or Entry Into Armed Forces (§ 30.1 to 30.4)

Part 31 - Crediting Other Public Employment As State Service (§ 31.1)

Part 32 - Suspension Of Rules (§ 32.1)

Part 33 - Applicability (§ 33.1 to 33.2)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
